Sentencas: A novel method for the determination of linear and cyclic siloxane compounds (L2, L3, D3, D4, D5, and D6) in biogas was developed by combining gas chromatography (GC) with inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS).
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: Using a continuous liquid quench sampling system, biogas samples were collected from a Swiss biogas production plant processing manure and mixed organic wastes.
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: Although significant concentrations of siloxanes are normally linked to biogas from wastewater treatment plants (WWTP) or landfill gas, manure and mixed organic waste samples also showed values in the range of 0.1 mg(s1) Nm(-3), which would be particularly critical for appliances such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: The GC-ICP-MS method showed very good linearity for all the investigated compounds (R-2 between 0.999 and 1.000).
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: The limits of detection and quantification (LOD and LOQ) in the gas for cyclic compounds, such as D5, vary based upon the used sampling conditions (approximate range of 0.002-0.004 mg(s1) Nm(-3) and 0.007-0.014 mg(s1) Nm(-3), respectively).
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: To the best of our knowledge, these LOD and LOQ values are by far among the lowest reported in literature and they satisfy the EURAMET (the European Association of National Metrology Institutes) requirements, which fix recommended levels for Si total amounts between 0.1 and 0.3 mg(s1)
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: Nm(-3) for measurement in biogas or bio-methane.
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: The GC-ICP-MS method was evaluated by comparing its performances with a flame ionization detector (FID), operated in parallel with ICP-MS, and with GC-MS (gas chromatography - mass spectrometry).
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: The GC-FID showed higher detection limits and matrix effects than GC-ICP-MS.
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: Nevertheless, it can still be suitable for an initial estimation of the siloxane compounds present in the biogas, at least for samples having relatively high concentration, by following some data treatment optimization.
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS

Sentencas: The GC-MS analyses were considered here as a further confirmation of the accuracy of the GC-ICP-MS results.
Titulo: Siloxane compounds in biogas from manure and mixed organic waste: Method development and speciation analysis with GC-ICP-MS
